img_summary: The image depicts an in-game item from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong." The item is likely an ingredient used for crafting or other purposes within the game. Based on the context provided, it is a plant similar to the Purple Lingzhi, Nine-Capped Lingzhi, Jade Lotus, and Aged Ginseng, which are all ingredients found in Black Wind Mountain and can be bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor.
